Class Map

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Map
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Map
extends greenfoot.Actor
implements java.io.Serializable

Displays a portion of the items in the game, taking up the majority of the screen. In addition to displaying the Cells and Units, this class also handles user input as well.

Version:
Beta 2.1
Author:
Alston Lin
See Also:

Constructor Detail

Map

public Map(greenfoot.World world)
Constructor for the Map. Scales the image and populates world with Cells

Parameters:
world - The World that the map will be added in
Method Detail

act

public void act()
Checks if the map required panning, as well as handling user input. Called before every frame is rendered.

act in class greenfoot.Actor
